trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to implement a navigation progress bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件以實作的瀏覽進度列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A>屬性來判斷已成功下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A>屬性來判斷可供下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes that are loaded already.
trans-unit.target: 已載入的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that have been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得已下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes that have been loaded or -1 to indicate that the download has completed.
trans-unit.target: 已載入的位元組數目，或是 -1，表示下載已完成。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display the current navigation progress in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性顯示在目前的瀏覽進度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A> property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A>屬性來判斷可供下載的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the document being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得所要載入文件的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display the current navigation progress in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性顯示在目前的瀏覽進度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A>屬性來判斷已成功下載的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名為`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
